actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exclusion allowance for gain from the sale or exchange of a residence in the case of individuals 65 and over.

summary.text: Increases the tax exclusion allowance for gain from the sale or exchange of a residence in the case of individuals 65 and over from $20,000 to $30,000 under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exclusion allowance for gain from the sale or exchange of a residence in the case of individuals 65 and over.
